content.p:
ยง 142-dd. Certificate to be filed. Before any person shall sell, offer
or expose for sale, barter, give, or otherwise supply in this state any
product labelled as agricultural liming material, he or she shall, for
each brand thereof, file biennially with the commissioner, upon forms
supplied by the commissioner, a certificate for the registration of each
such brand, stating the name, principal office address and plant
location of the manufacturer or shipper, the type of liming material,
the brand name, the minimum specifications as to total neutralizing
value, the calcium and magnesium content, effective neutralizing value
and fineness. Such certificate shall constitute a warranty by the
supplier to the receiver that the material will meet the minimum
specifications stated therein at the time of delivery.
